description.text: The next eye holder is an undead. An undead with many tricks up its sleeves to be precise... It's surrounded by its followers, so you might have trouble getting to him.

The Skeleton Lord is probably the most powerful undead I've ever seen. I'm surprised you're able to take him down. Alright, let's see... The next eye is guarded by a renowned Holy Knight. I'm not sure if it's possible for even you. Anyhow, I'll give you its location. Proceed with caution.
